post:
Hello everyone, I have finally removed the whois protection on my domain just so I could post offers here on LET.  Anyways, since I've started ChromiumHosting in December, we have significantly grown.  We just started off only selling shared hosting.  We then expanded to reseller hosting, vps hosting, and then dedicated server hosting.  Within the next month we will be expanding to many, many more locations for your dedicated server needs.  

**512MB RAM VPS**
512MB Ram (NO BURST, just guaranteed ram.)
20GB HDD
1TB Monthly Bandwidth
VePortal Control Panel 
1Ghz CPU Share 
Semi-Managed (We will try our hardest to help you with anything such as installing control panels.)
MANY OS's AVAILABLE
ORDER HERE: http://www.chromiumhosting.com/portal/cart.php?a=add&pid=7

Miami Florida - ColoHouse Datacenter
